ygData.subject: Re: Charismatic Carillion
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks so much! As usual, this list has been a great help. Kirree ... From: Lost Child  To:  Sent: Monday, August
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks so much! As usual, this list has been a great help.

Kirree
----- Original Message -----
From: Lost Child <lostchild@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, August 09, 1999 7:57 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Charismatic Carillion


> From: "Lost Child" <lostchild@...>
>
> Did you put at least one pratice point into your wind skill? If you did,
> you might have to practice your wind skill up using your lv 16 song.
Since
> the charisma song is not continuous.. it is impossible to raise your wind
> skill with it. Trust me, you will want your wind skill to be capped when
> you hit 19.
> >
> >I have a question on this song. I am a level 17 bard, and just recently
> >acquired this song. I equipped my flute, and tried to play it. I got
the
> >following message: Learn to sing it before you play it. I proceeded to
> >try and sing it, and could never get it going. Nothing but one missed
note
> >after the other. Is this common? Am I doing something wrong? Also, do
I
> >need a mouthpiece for my flute? I bought the flute from the Bard's
Guild,
> >and eqipped it as usual before I tried the song. Any help at all would
be
> >greatly appreciated. Thanks.
> >
> >Kirree
> >Xegony Server
>
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------

> ONElist: your connection to like-minds and kindred spirits.
